sentences.en: A host of problems may delay the opening of the Channel Tunnel.
sentences.cn: 可能推迟英吉利海峡隧道开通的问题一大筐。

sentences.en: He was helping wire up the Channel Tunnel last season.
sentences.cn: 他上一季在协助英吉利海峡隧道的电缆铺设工作.

sentences.en: Rescuers used props to stop the roof of the tunnel collapsing.
sentences.cn: 救援人员用支柱防止隧道顶塌陷。

sentences.en: the Anglo-French consortium that built the Channel Tunnel
sentences.cn: 修建英吉利海峡隧道的英法财团

sentences.en: The caterpillars tunnel into the fruit to grow and mature.
sentences.cn: 毛虫钻入果实，并在其中生长为成虫。

sentences.en: the Channel Tunnel (= between England and France )
The Channel Tunnel project is the biggest civil engineering project in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英吉利海峡隧道是欧洲最大的土木工程。

sentences.en: The Channel tunnel was due to open towards the end of 1993.
sentences.cn: 海峡隧道预计1993年年底前开通。

sentences.en: The Chicago River flooded the city'sunderground tunnel system.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥河的河水淹没了城市的地下隧道系统。

sentences.en: The path goes under the river by way of the tunnel.
sentences.cn: 这条通道经隧道从河下经过。

sentences.en: The thieves tunnelled under all the security devices.
sentences.cn: 小偷们在所有的那些安全装置下面都挖了地道。

sentences.en: The tunnel is a brilliant feat of engineering.
sentences.cn: 这条隧道是工程方面的光辉业绩。

sentences.en: They thought he had escaped through a specially constructed tunnel.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他是通过一条专门修建的地道逃跑的。

sentences.en: They will have to block up the entrance to the tunnel.
sentences.cn: 他们将不得不封闭通往隧道的入口.

sentences.en: To build this tunnel we had to cut through the solid rock.
sentences.cn: 为了修建这条隧道,我们必须凿开坚硬的岩石.

words.tran_cn: 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道

phrases.tran_cn: [解]腕隧道；屈肌管；腕道症候群

phrases.phrase: light at the end of the tunnel

phrases.tran_cn: 隧道掘进机；隧道钻巷机；隧道开挖机
隧道入口，隧道洞口；隧道口
水洞；水槽，水筒；输水隧道

trans.tran_en: a passage that has been dug under the ground for cars, trains etc to go through
to dig a long passage under the ground
